Physical AI Edge Kit (Pro Student Build)

assessments.title: Assessments & Evaluation
assessments.description: How You Earn Your Place Among the Top 1% of Robotics Engineers in 2025

hardware/economy-kit.title: Economy Jetson Student Kit – Your Complete Edge AI Robotics Lab (~$650, Dec 2025)
hardware/economy-kit.description: Affordable, powerful, and purpose-built for robotics students. This kit delivers professional-grade capabilities at a fraction of the cost of traditional robotics hardware.

hardware/edge-kit.title: Physical AI Edge Kit — The Exact Hardware That Ships in 2025 Robots (~$950–$1,400)
hardware/edge-kit.description: This is the real-world, production-grade edge stack used by 2025 humanoid startups, warehouse robots, and capstone students who refuse to stay in simulation.

hardware/robot-options.title: Robot Lab Options (Choose One)
hardware/robot-options.description: Choose the hardware platform that best fits your research goals and budget. Each option comes with complete ROS 2 integration, pre-configured launch files, and curriculum-aligned lab exercises.

hardware/workstation.title: Digital Twin Workstation
hardware/workstation.description: Build your professional robotics simulation environment that mirrors industrial-grade development setups used by leading humanoid companies.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: This course introduces the foundational concepts and practical applications of physical AI and humanoid robotics. Students will gain hands-on experience with ROS 2, Gazebo, Unity, and NVIDIA Isaac™, culminating in the ability to design, simulate, and deploy AI-driven robotic systems.

modules/gazebo-unity.title: Module 2: The Digital Twin – Gazebo Classic & Unity Robotics (Complete & In-Depth)

modules/nvidia-isaac.title: Module 3: NVIDIA Isaac Platform – The Complete AI Robotics Stack (2025 Edition)

modules/ros2.title: Module 1: ROS 2 – The Robotic Nervous System (Complete & Detailed)

modules/vla-capstone.title: Module 4: Vision-Language-Action Models – The Brain of Tomorrow’s Robots + Final Capstone (2025 Edition)

outcomes.title: Course Learning Outcomes
outcomes.description: Humanoid & Advanced Robotics Developer Program – 2025 Edition

tutorial-basics/congratulations.description: You have just learned the basics of Docusaurus and made some changes to the initial template.

tutorial-basics/create-a-blog-post.description: Docusaurus creates a page for each blog post, but also a blog index page, a tag system, an RSS feed...

tutorial-basics/create-a-document.description: Documents are groups of pages connected through:

tutorial-basics/create-a-page.title: Create a Page
tutorial-basics/create-a-page.description: Add Markdown or React files to src/pages to create a standalone page:

tutorial-basics/deploy-your-site.title: Deploy your site
tutorial-basics/deploy-your-site.description: Docusaurus is a static-site-generator (also called Jamstack).

tutorial-basics/markdown-features.title: Markdown Features
tutorial-basics/markdown-features.description: Docusaurus supports Markdown and a few additional features.

tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.title: Manage Docs Versions
tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.description: Docusaurus can manage multiple versions of your docs.

why-physical-ai.title: Why Physical AI Is the Biggest Technological Shift of Our Lifetime
why-physical-ai.description: We are standing at the exact moment in history when bits finally meet atoms at scale.
